title: @Riot Question about skins on my acc
body: I just saw that Maokai will get this year Victorious skin.I really don't want that thing and his skin on my main acc(I mean acc I "borrowed" from Riot games, like the rest of them).So when we all get the skin, what I need to do for u to remove that thing and his skin from my main? Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
After ranked rewards go out, feel free to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to request removal of the items. We'll be more than happy to help out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
OK I will.Thx for the answer.

Victorious skin is only for Gold players and above. Looks like you are Bronze at the moment according to opgg. You won't get that skin if you are not at least Gold5 at the end of the Season.

However, let's say you reach Gold: once it's added in your account (most likely end of November), you can contact Player Support and say you don't want it, they may be able to help you.
I said on my main. This is bought acc used only on boards(I wanted to use it for trolling in bronze but that felt stupid so I never did it).
